str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
High priest, chief priest. From arche and hiereus; the high-priest; by extension a chief priest.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Neuter of a presumed derivative of arguros; silvery, i.e. cash; specially, a silverling.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular

str2: (a) I cast, throw, rush, (b) often, in the weaker sense: I place, put, drop. A primary verb; to throw.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Neuter 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A gift, offering, anything consecrated to God.
Of time: when, after; of cause: since, because; otherwise: else. From epi and ei; thereupon, i.e. Since.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Blood, literally, figuratively or specially; by implication, bloodshed, also kindred.
A price, honor. From tino; a value, i.e. Money paid, or valuables; by analogy, esteem, or the dignity itself.
